public class Poly
extends Shape

checkPoly

private boolean checkPoly(Poly q,
                          CollisionShape p)
Iterates over the edges of q and checks the projection of q against the projection of p - if all projections overlap, return true

Parameters:
q - The Poly to make separating axes from
p - The other Poly to project
Returns:
If the projections of q and p are overlapping on every axis of q
